timeline.bodyText: Since we have released the artifacts for 1.4.0.0, we should be updating this version to 1.5.0.0-SNAPSHOT which reflects the development for supporting elasticsearch 7.5.0. What do you think ?
timeline.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: I agree that we should change the version to 1.5.0.0-SNAPSHOT in the master branch, but I think we should do that after we merge this PR into master and cut a 1.4 branch from it.
replies.author: allenyin96

replies.bodyText: Okay sounds good. I was confused seeing the artifacts already released. Approved the PR.
replies.author: sujithvm

timeline.bodyText: we don't need this line anymore.
timeline.author: hardik-k-shah
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -448,6 +449,7 @@ public static int execute(final String[] args) throws Exception {
                 .put(SSLConfigConstants.OPENDISTRO_SECURITY_SSL_TRANSPORT_ENFORCE_HOSTNAME_VERIFICATION_RESOLVE_HOST_NAME, !nrhn)
                 .put(SSLConfigConstants.OPENDISTRO_SECURITY_SSL_TRANSPORT_ENABLED, true)
                 .put(SSLConfigConstants.OPENDISTRO_SECURITY_SSL_TRANSPORT_ENABLE_OPENSSL_IF_AVAILABLE, useOpenSSLIfAvailable)

timeline.bodyText:
we should check this runtime.
If java12 is available, this flag should be false otherwise it should be true.
We should also check how we are building and packaging with? is it Java 8, 11 or 12?
timeline.author: hardik-k-shah

replies.bodyText: Made the changes. With github action, we are building the package with Java 11
replies.author: allenyin96

timeline.message: Removing support for OpenSSL for java12+
